name: bazarr
description: Bazarr is a companion tool to Radarr and Sonarr that automatically downloads and manages subtitles for media libraries. It supports many subtitle providers, languages, and integrates with Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby.
features: Subtitle Management: Automatically download subtitles for your media. Complete coverage.
Radarr & Sonarr: Companion tool for movie and TV automation. Perfect integration.
Multi-Language: Support for numerous subtitle languages. Global accessibility.
Provider Support: Works with many subtitle providers. Comprehensive sources.
Media Server Integration: Integrates with Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. Seamless compatibility.
Automatic Downloads: Set and forget subtitle automation. Hands-free operation.
Quality Control: Choose subtitle quality and format preferences. Customizable.
Self-Hosted: Run your own subtitle management. Complete control.
